video.title: How to Survive the End of the World
video.synopsis: This unsettling documentary series discusses methods for surviving doomsday scenarios such as a volcanic cataclysm and a global pandemic.

episodes.synopsis: What sounds like science fiction becomes all-too real as scientists show how a deadly pandemic could turn us into a race of zombie-like beings.
episodes.title: Zombie Earth

episodes.synopsis: Physicists and space scientists explore how a simultaneous eruption of the earth's "super volcanoes" would leave the world's surface uninhabitable.
episodes.title: Hell on Earth

episodes.synopsis: Experts examine how a catastrophic event in our solar system may send the earth spiraling away from the sun, ultimately producing a frozen planet.
episodes.title: Frozen Earth

episodes.synopsis: Climate experts theorize about how humanity may fight back against an atmosphere of deadly weather phenomena spiraling out of control.
episodes.title: Monster Storm

episodes.synopsis: Experts examine nanotechnology and the dynamics between man and machine, illustrating that even the smallest inventions can threaten life on earth.
episodes.title: Micro Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Scientists explain how a massive volume of water could arrive from outer space and create devastating consequences for our planet and its population.
episodes.title: Flooded Earth
